The name of that story was Rurouni Bishonen: Saitou's 34th Birthday by Midori-chan. The link is:
http://www.fanfiction.net/read.php?storyid=1254492

I've put it up in the database also. Oh, and for the record, only Hijikata was sake flavored. Saito was bumbleberry flavored.

I have this one up in the database too, but I'm going to sing its praises here. Nigihayami Haruko wrote a few poems dedicated to the Shinsengumi called To the Forgotten Dreams.
http://www.fanfiction.net/read.php?storyid=1604085
I hope all of you will take a peak at least.
